features: Two 8-fluid ounce pump bottles of Clean & Clear Oil-Free Day & Night Facial Cleansers. Includes Morning Burst Hydrating Facial Cleanser with cucumber extract & Night Relaxing Deep Cleaning Face Wash with sea minerals & sea kelp extracts
These facial cleansers clean deep down to pores to remove dirt, oil & impurities & are suitable for daily use. The day & night face washes are oil-free, so they won't clog pores

The Morning Burst Hydrating Facial Cleanser is a foaming cleanser formulated with an invigorating scent to help you wake up & a blend of cucumber & green mango extracts. It cleans deep while refreshing skin with an added touch of moisture

The Night Relaxing Deep Cleansing wash is a purifying cleanser formulated with calming aromas, deep sea minerals & sea kelp extract. It gently cleanses without over-drying. It cleans deep to wash away daily build-up, leaving you clean & relaxed
Use these gentle cleansing face washes day & night as a part of your daily skincare routine. To use, wet face, gently massage all over face, rinse thoroughly & pat dry
body.description: Get clean, fresh skin morning and night. This value pack contains two Clean & Clear oil-free, deep cleaning face washes to add to your daily skincare routine: Morning Burst Hydrating Facial Cleanser and Night Relaxing Deep Cleansing Wash. Suitable for daily use, both cleansers are oil-free and clean deep down to pores to remove dirt, oil, and impurities. The foaming morning cleanser is formulated with an invigorating scent to help you wake up and a blend of cucumber and green mango extracts. It cleans deep while refreshing skin with an added touch of moisture. The purifying night cleanser combines calming aromas, deep sea minerals, and sea kelp extract, and cleanses away daily build-up gently yet deeply without over-drying, leaving you feeling clean and relaxed. To use the cleansers, gently massage all over wet face, rinse thoroughly, and pat dry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really like the morning and night cleansers, they lather easy, take off make up and my skin feels soft

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great price for this duo
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using clean and clear for many years and the price at other stores are ridiculous. I recently bought ONE bottle and it was more then the price of these two. I have this on auto ship because of how great the price is! I will always recommend clean and clear face wash, they always have the absolute best face washes. The morning burst smells great and does help to wake me up as well as add extra moisture to my face. The night wash is also amazing, it has a very soothing smell and makes my face feel super clean. 10/10 recommend!!
